statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // empty'); user=$(whoami); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); git_branch=""; git_dirty=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then git_branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); [ -z "$git_branch" ] && git_branch=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if ! git -C "$cwd" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$cwd" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then git_dirty="*"; fi; fi; elixir_version=""; [ -f "$cwd/mix.exs" ] && elixir_version=$(elixir --short-version 2>/dev/null); output="$(printf '\033[1;35m%s\033[0m' "$user") $(printf '\033[1;32m%s\033[0m' "$dir")"; [ -n "$git_branch" ] && output="${output} $(printf '\033[1;34m%s%s\033[0m' "$git_branch" "$git_dirty")"; [ -n "$elixir_version" ] && output="${output} $(printf '\033[35m\033[0m')$(printf '\033[1;36mv%s\033[0m' "$elixir_version")"; [ -n "$model" ] && output="${output} $(printf '\033[1;33m%s\033[0m' "$model")"; echo "$output"
